subtitle.withoutAppointee: These will be used to send you information about your appeal.

withoutAppointee.required: Enter the first line of your address
withoutAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your Address line 1 and enter it again

withAppointee.required: Enter the first line of their address
withAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your Address line 1 and enter it again

withoutAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your Address line 2 and enter it again

withAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check their Address line 2 and enter it again

withoutAppointee.required: Enter the town or city from your address
withoutAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your Town/City and enter it again

withAppointee.required: Enter the town or city from their address
withAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your Town/City and enter it again

withoutAppointee.required: Enter the county from your address
withoutAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your County and enter it again

withAppointee.required: Enter the county from their address
withAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your County and enter it again

withoutAppointee.required: Enter the postcode from your address
withoutAppointee.invalidPostcode: The online appeal service is not available to people from this region. This postcode should match the postcode you entered to access the service.
withoutAppointee.invalidPostcodeIba: This is not a valid postcode in England, Scotland or Wales.
withoutAppointee.invalidPostcodeIbaNI: This is not a valid postcode in England, Scotland, Wales or Northern Ireland.

withAppointee.required: Enter the postcode from their address
withAppointee.invalidPostcode: The online appeal service is not available to people from this region. This postcode should match the postcode you entered to access the service.

phoneNumber.title: Phone number (optional)
phoneNumber.hint: This may be used to contact you about your appeal

withoutAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid phone number. Check it and enter it again

withAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid phone number. Check it and enter it again

emailAddress.title: Email address (optional)
emailAddress.hint: Youâ€™ll get updates on your appeal and a link so you can track your appeal online

withoutAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid email address. Check it and enter it again

withAppointee.invalid: You have entered an invalid email address. Check it and enter it again
